channel.title: DWP on Phil Chapman's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DWP on Phil Chapman's Blog

item.title: Last day as a civil servant
item.description: Moving from bioinformatics to data science Almost exactly a year after contemplating my last day as a bioinformatician, I am now contemplating my last day as a data scientist in the Department for Work and Pensions, part of the UK civil service. As I’ve blogged about previously, bioinformatics experience is highly relevant in the data science job market, and I’ve also discovered how important the ‘science’ bit of data science is.
